forum.content:
作詞：許常德
作曲：Yoshiki

原來我 一直都是一個人 
原來怨恨 都是深情
原來命運 都是被決定 
原來緣份 是要讓愛被哭醒 

Sing without you I'll sing without you

Can't you feel my heart Falling through the rain

I'll sing without you I'll sing without you

Can't you hold my tears 'Cause, still
I love you

urls.description: 江得勝 - 風云(Sorry for the not so good quailty) whoever wants this full song can text me up.....remember
urls.title: 江得勝 - 風云
